title: The Favorites Sports Betting Podcast - College Football Spring Best Bets w/ Collin Wilson
itunes:title: The Favorites Sports Betting Podcast - College Football Spring Best Bets w/ Collin Wilson
description:
The biggest spring practices are a wrap, and that means Action college football betting expert Collin Wilson is ready to give out his favorite way-too-early bets of the 2022 college football season. Action hosts Chad Millman and pro gambler Simon Hunter ask Collin about his College Football Playoff bets, his Heisman handicapping, thoughts on LSU under Brian Kelly and so much more. 

Plus, if you're in Las Vegas next week for the NFL Draft, don't forget to RSVP at the link below to Action Network's free pre-party at Circa's Stadium Swim in downtown Las Vegas. https://www.actionnetwork.com/press/action-nfl-draft-pre-party #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
